visual-management.pageDescription: Manage complex and interdependent production processes visually to envision workflows and tackle problems upfront better.
visual-management.title: Draft for Visual Management

baseline.one: Build complex and customized visual management systems without having to write any line of code.
baseline.two: Draft is the easiest and cost-effective way of digitizing your visual management walls.

obeya-room.title: Virtual Obeya Room
obeya-room.text: Create tailor-made virtual Obeya rooms to control visually at the same place your whole lean management process.

twelve-month.title: Twelve-Month Roadmap
twelve-month.text: Envision the future of your organization and rally stakeholders with compelling and multi-layer strategic roadmaps.

gantt-chart.title: Gantt Chart
gantt-chart.text: Identify risks and prevent project delays by mapping how tasks are sequenced and linked to each other.

scheduling.title: Scheduling
scheduling.text: Allocate your resources optimally and improve your processes’ productivity by representing upcoming workloads across the whole production unit.

visual-management.features-bloc-title: A real no-code tool to build visual management systems

story-card.title: Visual Management Cards
story-card.text: Those cards can include various types of valuable data (id, status, complexity, color dots, etc.).

simple-navigation.title: Simple Navigation
simple-navigation.text: Access all of your drafts with a single click via a clean, simple, and intuitive tabbed file management system.

unified-living-environment.title: Ever-Evolving Environment
unified-living-environment.text: Drive better outcomes via Draft’s seamless, flexible, and intuitive visual document universe.

right-level-of-focus.title: Stay Focused
right-level-of-focus.text: Easily arrange large amounts of diverse information into many smaller, more focused fragments to improve decision-making.
